mapper.select: SELECT MAX (x.semester_start) semester_start, MAX (x.semester_end) semester_end, MAX (teacher_id) teacher_id FROM ( SELECT a.semester_start, a.semester_end, '' AS teacher_id FROM edu_semester a,edu_schedule b WHERE a.id = b.semester_id AND b.id = #{schedule_id} UNION SELECT '' AS semester_start, '' AS semester_end, a.teacher_id FROM edu_grades a WHERE a.id = #{grades_id} ) x

SELECT b.id schedule_detail_id, b.grades_id grades_id, b.week, b.start_time, b.end_time, a.name kc_name, a.teacher_wages wages FROM edu_grades a, edu_schedule_details b WHERE a.id = b.grades_id AND a.teacher_id = #{teacher_id} AND b.week = #{week} AND b.id = #{schedule_detail_id} ORDER BY b.week
mapper.insert: insert into edu_teacher_normal ( id, teacher_id, grades_id, schedule_detail_id, qk_time, week, kc_name, wages, dy_month, qj_zt) values ( #{item.id}, #{item.teacher_id}, #{item.grades_id}, #{item.schedule_detail_id}, #{item.qk_time}, #{item.week}, #{item.kc_name}, #{item.wages}, #{item.dy_month}, #{item.qj_zt})
